meanings.definition: A small tropical freshwater fish often kept in aquariums.
meanings.sent1: I love watching the colorful tetras swim around in the aquarium.
meanings.sent2: The tetras in the tank look so vibrant and lively.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tetras bring a tiny umbrella to the aquarium? To stay dry!
meanings.sent4: The tetras moved in unison, like a synchronized dance in the water.
meanings.sent5: The tetras' shimmering scales caught the light, creating a mesmerizing display.

meanings.sent1: There were four tetras sitting at the table, discussing their plans.
meanings.sent2: The tetras formed a perfect square as they swam together in the tank.
meanings.sent3: The four tetras decided to start a band called 'The Quartet of Fins'.
meanings.sent4: The tetras stood at the four corners of the room, symbolizing unity.
meanings.sent5: Each of the tetras represented a different season, coming together to form a harmonious group of four.
